name: Relic Splatter
description:
web monetization part I put a little circular radar that appears around the character when the player is close to a relic, in order to spot them quickly. To activate web monetization the player needs to activate a subscription on the Coil site.

 Follow me on twitter if you like my game @hav24  

Controls

- WASD or Arrow keys to move.
- Click and hold the mouse button to shoot and color walls. If you shoot downwards you can use your weapon as a Jetpack.
- Spacebar to change weapon.
